Class BevShop

java.lang.Object
BevShop
All Implemented Interfaces:
BevShopInterfce
public class BevShop
extends java.lang.Object
implements BevShopInterfce
This class represents a beverage shop, and acts as the data manager for the other classes in the program. The BevShop class implements BevShopShopInterface.
Version:
1, 05/08/2021
Author:
Jessica Bunting
